page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT IN CRANAGE
page.content: As we prepare the Domesday Book our country has a lot of unemployment.However the area we live in is very fortunate as a high proportion of the people have jobs. Locally there is the hospital which employs nursing and medical staff,gardeners,administrators and maintenance men. In Holmes Chapel there are shops and of course a large number of farms. There is also the animal feed mill and a fertiliser company quite near. Quite a large number have to travel further afield to work. There are large companies such as ICI in Alderley Edge,Macclesfield, Wilmslow Crewe and Manchester.The local people travel there daily by car but some may travel by train from the station in Holmes Chapel.
